protocols.description: A set of strings representing protocols.

elements.description: A string representing a protocol, such as HTTP or HTTPS.

allow.description: List of IPs or CIDR ranges to allow. One of `config.allow` or `config.deny` must be specified.

elements.description: A string representing an IP address or CIDR block, such as 192.168.1.1 or 192.168.0.0/16.

deny.description: List of IPs or CIDR ranges to deny. One of `config.allow` or `config.deny` must be specified.

elements.description: A string representing an IP address or CIDR block, such as 192.168.1.1 or 192.168.0.0/16.

status.description: The HTTP status of the requests that will be rejected by the plugin.

message.description: The message to send as a response body to rejected requests.
